help.title: Help & Documentation
help.introduction: Transfair is a simple and secure file sharing service that allows you to upload and share files with others through unique links.
help.uploadStep1: Go to the main page and drag & drop your files into the upload area, or click to select files.
help.uploadStep2: You can upload multiple files at once, up to 2GB total.
help.uploadStep3: Click the 'Send' button to upload your files.
help.uploadStep4: Once uploaded, you'll receive a unique link to share your files. The link will be valid for 7 days.
help.uploadStep5: Copy the link and share it with anyone you want to give access to your files.
help.downloadStep1: Open the shared link you received.
help.downloadStep2: You'll see a list of all available files.
help.downloadStep3: Select individual files or use 'Select All' to choose multiple files.
help.downloadStep4: Click 'Download Selected' or 'Download All' to download the files.
help.downloadStep5: Files will be downloaded as a ZIP archive if multiple files are selected.
help.languageStep1: Look for the language switcher in the top-right corner of the page (globe icon).
help.languageStep2: Click on the dropdown to see available languages.
help.languageStep3: Select your preferred language (English or French).
help.languageStep4: The page will automatically switch to your selected language.
help.securityStep1: All files are securely stored and transmitted.
help.securityStep2: Share links remain active for 7 days after upload.
help.securityStep3: After 7 days, files are automatically deleted for security.
help.securityStep4: Maximum total file size per upload is 2GB.
help.securityStep5: No account registration required - completely anonymous.
help.tip1: You can preview text files before uploading.
help.tip2: Use descriptive file names to make sharing easier.
help.tip3: The service works on all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile.
help.tip4: Bookmark important download links before they expire.
help.supportText: If you encounter any issues or have questions, please check that your files meet the size requirements and try again. The service is designed to be simple and intuitive.
